original.resume_text:
MOHAMMED YAHYA HUSSAIN
Data Analyst - 2 Years
Ñ Karnataka, India  +91-7349033579 # mohammedyahyahussain1998@gmail.com ï Linkedin Profile § GitHub Profile
PROfiLE SUMMARY
Seasoned Data Analyst with 2+ years experience in Python, SQL, and Power BI , specializing in EDA, KPI reporting, and
visualization to optimize data workflow for stakeholders to help in decision-making and enhance data-driven business
performance .
EXPERIENCE
Sparklex Technologies
Aug 2023 – Present
Data Analyst
Bangalore, Karnataka
• Monthly revenue trends revealed flat growth despite rising subscriptions, prompting an investigation into churn drivers and
customer profitability.
• Unified 4+ disparate datasets billing, usage, customer, support using SQL — leveraging joins, CTEs, and window functions —
improving data availability and reducing query time by.
• Applied churn logic inactive >90 days, repeated late payments and performed data validation in Excel through pivots and
formulas, improving confidence in the analysis.
• Built 3 interactive Power BI dashboards with advanced DAX measures for churn percentage, Average Revenue Per User ARPU,
and Customer Lifetime Value CLV, reducing dependency on manual Excel reports and accelerating decision-making.
• Applied Python pandas, numpy, matplotlib to automate simple data preparation tasks and generate exploratory charts,
providing quick checks and visual insights that supported the main Excel and Power BI reporting.
• Presented analysis of churn patterns and customer segments, providing clarity on key risk factors and contributing to
retention improvement efforts.
• Participated in regular meetings to resolve the issue and offered technical support to the team.
PROJECTS
PhonePe Digital Payments Dataset Python | GitHub
Sept 2025
• Consolidated 2018–2021 multi-sheet payment datasets, applied Pandas/NumPy, ensuring standardized structure and
reliable insights.
• Evaluated state and district payment behavior, applied SQL-style grouping, uncovering demographic patterns and adoption
correlations.
• Automated Matplotlib visualizations, generated dynamic charts, enabling stakeholders to identify growth opportunities and
mitigate churn.
Social Media Ad Campaign Performance | Power BI | Github
Sept 2025
• Designed Power BI dashboard integrating 213M impressions data, enabling CTR and conversion insights across
demographics.
• Analyzed demographic spend patterns using DAX, uncovering male 30–34 efficiency and female 45–49 inefficiency for budget
optimization.
• Exposed funnel drop-offs causing negative ROI , recommending spend reallocation and CTR improvements for campaign
performance.
E Commerce | SQL | Github
Aug 2025
• Analyzed 100K+ transactional records by designing complex SQL queries , revealing customer purchase trends .
• Performed RFM(Recency, Frequency, and Monetar ) analysis for segmentation, classifying customers , and identifying churn
risks to guide proactive interventions.
• Delivered actionable insights through SQL-driven retention strategies, boosting repeat purchases and enhancing
engagement metrics significantly .
CPI Inflation | Advanced Excel | Github
July 2025
• Analyzed CPI drivers by grouping categories, applied statistical formulas, delivered accurate contribution insights.
• Developed automated Excel dashboards, integrated SUMIFS, VLOOKUP, pivots, enabled efficient data-driven comparisons.
• Identified dominant contributors forecasted trends with models, supported strategic planning and inventory adjustments.
KEY SKILLS
Data Analysis & Programming : Python (Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn), Javascript, Excel, EDA, Statistical Analysis, Insight
Generation
Database Management & Querying : SQL, MySQL, Joins, Aggregations, Subqueries, Windows Function & CTE’s
Business Intelligence & Reporting : Power BI, Excel Dashboard, KPI Reporting , Reporting Automation
Soft Skills & Tools : Analytical Thinking, Problem-Solving, Attention to Detail, Data Storytelling, Communication & Presentation
Skills
EDUCATION
Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU), Karnataka
2018 – 2023
BE in Computer Science
CGPA: 7.47
TRAINING AND CERTIfiCATIONS
Coding Ninjas
2024 – 2025
Data Analytics
Certificate Link
original.analysis_summary: Resume demonstrates strong intermediate-level skills and relevant projects with quantification. Minor gaps in advanced tools and emerging technologies exist. ATS compatibility is high due to clean formatting and keyword usage.

improved.resume_text:
MOHAMMED YAHYA HUSSAIN  
mohammedyahyahussain1998@gmail.com | +91-7349033579 | Karnataka, India | https://linkedin.com/in/mohammed-yahyahussain-551907250 | https://github.com/Mohammedyahyahussain  

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY  
Intermediate Data Analyst with expertise in Python, SQL, Power BI, and Statistics, experienced in exploratory data analysis, KPI reporting, and data visualization for business optimization. Seeking to leverage analytical and technical skills for impactful data-driven decision-making in data analytics roles.  

TECHNICAL SKILLS  
• Programming & Languages: Python (Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn), SQL, JavaScript  
• Data Visualization: Power BI, Excel Dashboards, Matplotlib, Seaborn  
• Soft Skills: Analytical Thinking, Problem Solving, Attention to Detail, Communication, Data Storytelling  
• Other Tools: Power Query, Jupyter Notebook  
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  
Sparklex Technologies | Aug 2023 – Present  
Data Analyst | Bangalore, Karnataka  
• Monthly revenue trends revealed flat growth despite rising subscriptions, prompting an investigation into churn drivers and customer profitability.  
• Unified 4+ disparate datasets (billing, usage, customer, support) using SQL — leveraging joins, CTEs, and window functions — improving data availability and reducing query time.  
• Applied churn logic (inactive >90 days, repeated late payments) and performed data validation in Excel through pivots and formulas, improving confidence in the analysis.  
• Built 3 interactive Power BI dashboards with advanced DAX measures for churn percentage, Average Revenue Per User (ARPU), and Customer Lifetime Value (CLV), reducing dependency on manual Excel reports and accelerating decision-making.  
• Applied Python pandas, numpy, matplotlib to automate simple data preparation tasks and generate exploratory charts, providing quick checks and visual insights that supported the main Excel and Power BI reporting.  
• Presented analysis of churn patterns and customer segments, providing clarity on key risk factors and contributing to retention improvement efforts.  
• Participated in regular meetings to resolve issues and offered technical support to the team.  

PROJECTS  
PhonePe Digital Payments Dataset | Python | GitHub: https://github.com/Mohammedyahyahussain/PhonePe-Python | Sept 2025  
• Consolidated 2018–2021 multi-sheet payment datasets, applied Pandas/NumPy, ensuring standardized structure and reliable insights.  
• Evaluated state and district payment behavior, applied SQL-style grouping, uncovering demographic patterns and adoption correlations.  
• Automated Matplotlib visualizations, generated dynamic charts, enabling stakeholders to identify growth opportunities and mitigate churn.  

Social Media Ad Campaign Performance | Power BI | Github: https://github.com/Mohammedyahyahussain/Social-Media-Ad-Campaign-PBI | Sept 2025  
• Designed Power BI dashboard integrating 213M impressions data, enabling CTR and conversion insights across demographics.  
• Analyzed demographic spend patterns using DAX, uncovering male 30–34 efficiency and female 45–49 inefficiency for budget optimization.  
• Exposed funnel drop-offs causing negative ROI, recommending spend reallocation and CTR improvements for campaign performance.  

E Commerce | SQL | Github: https://github.com/Mohammedyahyahussain/E-Commerce-SQL | Aug 2025  
• Analyzed 100K+ transactional records by designing complex SQL queries, revealing customer purchase trends.  
• Performed RFM (Recency, Frequency, and Monetary) analysis for segmentation, classifying customers, and identifying churn risks to guide proactive interventions.  
• Delivered actionable insights through SQL-driven retention strategies, boosting repeat purchases and enhancing engagement metrics significantly.  

CPI Inflation | Advanced Excel | Github: https://github.com/Mohammedyahyahussain/CPI_Inflation | July 2025  
• Analyzed CPI drivers by grouping categories, applied statistical formulas, delivered accurate contribution insights.  
• Developed automated Excel dashboards, integrated SUMIFS, VLOOKUP, pivots, enabled efficient data-driven comparisons.  
• Identified dominant contributors and forecasted trends with models, supported strategic planning and inventory adjustments.  

Loan Default | Python  
• Performed comprehensive exploratory data analysis on Superstore sales dataset with 21 features to uncover business insights through systematic data cleaning, feature engineering, and customer segmentation.  
• Applied statistical techniques including outlier detection, correlation analysis, and quintile-based segmentation to identify profitable and loss-making products and customer groups.  
• Created multi-dimensional visualizations (heatmaps, scatter plots, violin plots) to reveal sales-profit relationships and regional performance patterns.  

EDUCATION  
Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU), Karnataka  
BE in Computer Science | 2018 – 2023  
CGPA: 7.47  

CERTIFICATIONS  
Data Analytics | Coding Ninjas | 2024 – 2025  
Certificate Link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1N9IHjoRV54Ss5ugK0MZ4vAcjpritTq7i/view
